title: State Sovereignty Amendments

hilighted_provisions: This bill:<hr><ltbullet>defines terms;<hr><ltbullet>prohibits the governor or the chief executive officer of a political subdivision from declaring a state of emergency exclusively in response to an international organization's proclamation declaring a state of emergency;<hr><ltbullet>declares that an international organization has no power, jurisdiction, or legal authority in the state;<hr><ltbullet>prohibits the state, state agencies, and local governments from implementing or enforcing an international directive issued by an international organization; and<hr><ltbullet>makes technical changes.
